Liono looks over to Zardus "Sorry about that All maximals the is an order 
Attack the newcomers and them only until told to do otherwise clear. Zardus 
I'll work with my forces can you work with yours. I we can get them together 
we have a chance to Defeat shuko for good. Hellbeast you in or out."

Tigerhawk opens a relay channel to all maximals "Liono has order an all 
maximals to stop firing on Alliance and Preds until told other wise all those 
who break the peace treaty will answer to me.
